page.title: 16VILLAGE HALLS, West Cambs.
page.content:
Where possible, villagers try to keep one building as village hall, to be used as meeting place/focal point for Clubs and village functions.
Brington - no hall as such, use Area School buildings.
Catworth - when school closed 1970s, building purchased by village, funds raised particularly by WI. Run by Committee of volunteers, Charity Commissioners are Trustees. Parish Council has no direct connection, but make grants for specific projects.
Leighton Bromswold - attempt to buy closed village school failed, but the present owner lets former schoolroom for public meetings. (Private house)
